title: Five-spice chicken skewers with speedy chow mein
description: This quick Chinese chicken recipe packs a lot of flavour, and itâ€™s ready in under 30 minutes.
ingredients: 400g free-range chicken breast, cut into chunks

method.Step 1: Preheat the grill. In a bowl, mix the five-spice powder, 2 tbsp hoisin sauce, the ketchup and chicken. Thread the chicken onto 8 skewers and grill for 15 minutes until cooked through, turning once or twice.

method.Step 2: Meanwhile, thinly slice the spring onions and heat the oil in a wok.

method.Step 3: Put the spring onions, noodles and beansprouts into the hot wok and stir-fry over a high heat for 4-5 minutes until heated through. Season with soy sauce and the remaining hoisin sauce and divide among 4 bowls. Serve each bowl with 2 chicken skewers.
